safeDelivery.title: Cash delivery

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: CryptoCash is a calculator for crypto-to-cash exchange in Thailand. The actual exchange is done by our partner Ex24.pro.
faq.a2: Exchange is handled by Ex24.pro — a licensed exchanger with offices across Thailand. We just help you calculate savings.
faq.a3: Minimum 100 USDT. Maximum depends on partner availability (usually up to 50,000 USDT).
faq.a4: From 30 minutes to 2 hours depending on amount and your location.
faq.a5: Passport or ID for verification. Required by partner Ex24.pro.

meta.title: USDT Exchange in Thailand | CryptoCash
